definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: the young friend of Job Job 32:2, Job 32:4, Job 32:5, Job 32:6, Job 34:1, Job 35:1, Job 36:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: an Ephraimite, Samuel's great-grandfather 1Sa 1:1 cf. [[אֱלִיאָב]] 1Ch 6:12, [[אֱלִיאֵל]] v:1Ch 6:19.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: one of the brethren of David 1Ch 27:18 (cf. [[אֱלִיאָב]] 1Sa 16:6).
